channel.title: Save On The Persol PO3004V
channel.description: In Turin, 1917, an optician named Giuseppe Ratti began to make glasses designed for pilots and sports drivers. He designed the Protector glasses with comfort, protection and optimum vision in mind. The armed forces and pilots in the Italian Military adopted these glasses, as did the United States Airforce and the Swiss Military. Their practicality [...]

item.title: Save On The Persol PO3004V
item.description:
In Turin, 1917, an optician named Giuseppe Ratti began to make glasses designed for pilots and sports drivers. He designed the Protector glasses with comfort, protection and optimum vision in mind. The armed forces and pilots in the Italian Military adopted these glasses, as did the United States Airforce and the Swiss Military. Their practicality [...]
